result.eng: I would like to say this very clearly.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom é seo a rá go han-soiléir
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom é seo a rá go han-soiléir
result.html: Ba mhaith liom é seo a rá go han-soiléirI would like to say this very clearly.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom é seo a rá go han-soiléirI would like to say this very clearly.

result.eng: The question is much clearer now.
result.ga: Tá an cheist i bhfad níos soiléire anois
result.orig: Tá an cheist i bhfad níos soiléire anois
result.html: Tá an cheist i bhfad níos soiléire anoisThe question is much clearer now.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċeist i ḃfad níos soiléire anoisThe question is much clearer now.

result.ga: Tá sé i bhfad níos soiléire anois
result.orig: Tá sé i bhfad níos soiléire anois
result.html: Tá sé i bhfad níos soiléire anoisIt is much clearer now.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé i ḃfad níos soiléire anoisIt is much clearer now.

result.eng: It was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
result.ga: Bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadh
result.orig: Bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadh
result.html: Bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadhIt was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé soiléir óna dreaċ go raiḃ sí tar éis a ḃeiṫ ag caoineaḋIt was obvious from her face that she had been crying.

result.eng: According to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.
result.ga: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla sé
result.orig: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla sé

result.ponchtml: Dar leis an ollaṁ níl sé soiléir in aon ċor cén fáṫ ar ṫarla séAccording to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.
